news.content: That's it! :) Soon, we’ll share some highlights from 2020 and some words about 2021.
news.excerpt: Let’s take a moment to acknowledge what a year it’s been for all of us around the world.

previous.title: Sharing the November 2020 AMA recording
previous.excerpt: For those who missed the Ask Me Anything on Tuesday evening, you can find the call recording within!

next.title: Grid 2.4 is coming to mainnet soon!
